item.title: Pothole 15 cm deep and 40cm across, 8th July
item.description:
The road has been repaired recently in this place. You can see on the photo that the tarmac is new. The road below the repair is collapsing and the hole is becoming deeper by the day as the cars crash into the hole. It is only a matter of time before the first tyre bursts as the car drives into it. It also makes a horrible noise every time a car crashes into the hole. A horrible disturbance for those living in the houses next to it. Please sort it out promptly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastcombe Avenue, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping corner of Westdale Rd & Eglinton Rd, 8th July
item.description:
The fly tipping that was first reported on the 21/05/2025 and has been reportedly myself and other on numerous occasions has had more added to it. A double mattress, broken down furniture and cardboard boxes amongst other items have been added to the heap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eglinton Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees too tall, 8th July
item.description:
The trees have grown so tall outside the flats that they are blocking the sunshine. We used to get a good few hours of sunshine on the balconies but now we lose it at 5pm.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31-59 Thannington Court, Restons Crescent, Avery Hill, London

item.title: Colveston Crescent, 8th July
item.description:
I know this is a private landlord problem, but can we do something to try to cut these plants? They are almost occupying all the pavements. A person with a wheelchair or a person with luggage or anything will not be able to pass on the pavement soon.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colvestone Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 8th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Park Lane, Charlton, London

item.title: Overgrown trees, 8th July

item.title: Wonky manhole cover., 8th July
item.description:
